replies.body: Well Avicus holds a period of time where you make an Application, Which needs to be approved and then you do Interviews.

replies.body:
Post your staff application here when applications open: 
http://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=3

Applications are expected to upon around July.
replies.body_tagged:
Post your staff application here when applications open: 
http://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=3

replies.body:
Please refer to what has been stated above. However, in your current state, you are not eligible enough to "get mod". First of all, you need a minimum of 100 forums posts, which you do not have.
Secondly, you need to have at least 1 day of total online time, and you only have an hour.
However, if you spend more time on the server and forums, you may think of applying.
